title: Gold elo is really hard to climb
body:
How do i climb out of this elo? I rarely ever die to solokills, and usually win lane and yet I always seem to lose more than I win. I was recently at Gold 2 with a winrate of 60% but now its dropped so much because im getting matched with consistently bad players and got demoted to gold 3. Since then, Ive had so much trouble trying to find winning games either because of feeding top or bot lanes. Either way, it seems as though my team is consistently worse than the enemies. I'm also always checking dmg to champ stat at the end game and most games i am either at the top or second most. As a one-trick syndra should i switch to another champ that can hard solo carry or have more impact? Because I'm doubting that Syndra is viable for climbing elo. Here's my op.gg. Note that I have consistently high KDA and rarely feeding in games.
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=mandarindubbed

A loss at 0LP pretty much secures a demoted rank. But sometimes you'll get lucky and not. I really can not figure it out for the life of me.
